column4: Hello folks, sorry to repeat: any idea on what can cause my left click to become unresponsive since I updated karmic a week or so ago ? I'm on a desktop computer, mouse works on Windows os, disabling Compiz changes nothing. Any help welcome, it's very crippling. Thanks.
kneeskrap3r : Really, ok, why, is it because you think something updated badly ?
make sure u install the best and stable package for your GREAT ubuntu
